00032 template<
00033   class STRING_TYPE = string,
00034   typename STRING_TYPE::value_type* ALPHABET = a2z,
00035   uint32_t ALPHABET_SIZE = a2z_size,
00036 
00037   //------------bucket property-------------
00038   uint32_t BUCKET_SIZE = 8196,//byte
00039   uint8_t SPLIT_RATIO = 75,
00040   
00041   //--------------hash table-------------
00042   size_t ENTRY_SIZE_POW= 10,//2^10
00043   class HASH_FUNCTION = simple_hash,
00044   int INIT_BUCKET_SIZE=64,
00045   
00046   //----------bucket cache---------
00047   uint64_t BUCKET_CACHE_LENGTH = 10000000000,//bytes, it must be larger than 2 bucket size
00048   class BucketCachePolicy= CachePolicyLARU,
00049   
00050   //----------node cache-----------
00051   uint64_t NODE_CACHE_LENGTH = 1000000000,//bytes, it must be larger than 3 node size.
00052   class NodeCachePolicy = CachePolicyLARU
00053   >
00054 class BTrie
00055 {
00056   typedef BTrie<STRING_TYPE,  ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE, BUCKET_SIZE, SPLIT_RATIO, ENTRY_SIZE_POW, HASH_FUNCTION,INIT_BUCKET_SIZE, BUCKET_CACHE_LENGTH, BucketCachePolicy, NODE_CACHE_LENGTH, NodeCachePolicy> SelfType;
00057   typedef Bucket<STRING_TYPE, BUCKET_SIZE, SPLIT_RATIO, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> BucketType;
00058   typedef NodeCache<STRING_TYPE, NODE_CACHE_LENGTH, NodeCachePolicy, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> NodeCacheType;
00059   typedef BucketCache<STRING_TYPE, BUCKET_CACHE_LENGTH, BUCKET_SIZE, SPLIT_RATIO, BucketCachePolicy, ALPHABET, ALPHABET_SIZE> BucketCacheType;
00060   typedef typename NodeCacheType::nodePtr AlphabetNodePtr;
00061   typedef typename BucketCacheType::nodePtr BucketPtr;
00062   typedef Map<string, uint64_t, ENTRY_SIZE_POW, HASH_FUNCTION, INIT_BUCKET_SIZE> HashMap;
00063   typedef typename STRING_TYPE::value_type charT;

00069   BTrie(const string& filename="_btrie")
00070     :pNodeCache_(NULL)
00071   {
00072     string bstr = filename+".buk";
00073     string nstr = filename + ".nod";

00078     
00079     nodf_ = fopen(nstr.c_str(), "r+");
00080     if (nodf_ == NULL)
00081     {
00082       nodf_ = fopen(nstr.c_str(), "w+");
00083       pNodeCache_ = new NodeCacheType(nodf_, 1);
00084       AlphabetNodePtr n = pNodeCache_->newNode();
00085       n->add2disk();
00086     }
00087     else
00088     {
00089       pNodeCache_ = new NodeCacheType(nodf_, 1);
00090       isload = true;
00091     }
00092

00095     if (bukf_ == NULL)
00096     {
00097       bukf_ = fopen(bstr.c_str(), "w+");
00098     }

00105 //     }

00110     }

00178 protected:
00179   void load_(AlphabetNodePtr& n)
00180   {
00181     uint64_t lastAddr = -1;
00182     uint32_t lastMem = -1;
00183     for (uint32_t i=0; i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)
00184     {
00185       uint64_t diskAddr = n->getDiskAddr(i);
00186       uint32_t memAddr = n->getMemAddr(i);
00187 
00188       if (lastAddr==diskAddr)
00189       {
00190         n->setMemAddr(i, lastMem);
00191         continue;
00192       }
00193       
00194       lastAddr = diskAddr;
00195       
00196       if (diskAddr == (uint64_t)-1)
00197         continue;
00198       
00199       if (diskAddr%2==0)
00200       {
00201         if (pBucketCache_->isFull())
00202         {
00203           continue;
00204         }
00205         
00206         pBucketCache_->getNodeByMemAddrForLoading(memAddr, diskAddr);
00207         n->setMemAddr(i, memAddr);
00208         lastMem = memAddr;
00209         continue;
00210       }
00211 
00212       if(pNodeCache_->isFull())
00213       {
00214         continue;
00215       }
00216       
00217       
00218       AlphabetNodePtr n1 = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00219       n->setMemAddr(i, memAddr);
00220       lastMem = memAddr;
00221       
00222       load_(n1);
00223     }
00224     
00225   }

00228   {
00229     if (len != (size_t)-1)
00230       return str.substr(pos, len);
00231 
00232     return str.substr(pos);

00235   wiselib::UString substr(const wiselib::UString& str, size_t pos, size_t len=(size_t)-1)
00236   {
00237     wiselib::UString tmp;
00238     if (len != (size_t)-1)
00239     {
00240       str.substr(tmp, pos, len);
00241       return tmp;
00242     }
00243 
00244     str.substr(tmp, pos);
00245     return tmp;
00246   }

00252   bool insert(const STRING_TYPE& str, uint64_t contentAddr)
00253   {
00254     if (pNodeCache_==NULL)
00255     {
00256       return false;
00257     }
00258     
00259     STRING_TYPE* pStr = new STRING_TYPE(str);
00260     
00261     AlphabetNodePtr n_1 ;
00262     
00263     uint64_t addr = 1;
00264     uint32_t memAddr = 0;
00265     
00266     AlphabetNodePtr n = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, addr);//root node address is 1 in disk and 0 in cache
00267         
00268     for (; pStr->length()>1; )
00269     {
00270       if (n.isNull())
00271       {
00272         //throw exception
00273         return false;
00274       }
00275 
00276       pNodeCache_->lockNode(n.getIndex());
00277       uint32_t idx = n->getIndexOf((*pStr)[0]);
00278       uint64_t diskAddr = n->getDiskAddr(idx);
00279       memAddr = n->getMemAddr(idx);
00280 
00281       if(diskAddr == (uint64_t)-1 )
00282       {
00283         // new bucket, then add rest string into bucket, return.
00284         //cout<<"new bucket, then add rest string into bucket, return.\n";
00285         
00286         BucketPtr b = newBucket();
00287     
00288         b->addString(pStr, contentAddr);
00289         uint64_t addr =b->add2disk();
00290         n->setAllDiskAddr( addr);
00291         n->setAllMemAddr(b.getIndex());
00292     
00293         return true;
00294       }
00295 
00296       
00297       if (diskAddr%2==0)
00298       {
00299         //load bucket
00300         
00301         //cout<<diskAddr<<" load bucket;\n";
00302             
00303         BucketPtr b = loadBucket(memAddr, diskAddr);
00304         pBucketCache_->lockNode(memAddr);
00305 
00306         //b->display(cout);
00307         
00308         n->setMemAddr(idx, memAddr);
00309     
00310         size_t len = pStr->length();
00311         b->addString(pStr, contentAddr);
00312         //cout<<diskAddr<<" added string!;\n";
00313         
00314         //cout<<*pBucket_;
00315         if (b->isFull())
00316         {
00317           //cout<<" ----->fullllll!"<<endl;
00318 
00319           vector<STRING_TYPE> leftStr;
00320           vector<uint64_t> leftAddr;
00321           splitBucket(b, n, diskAddr, idx, leftStr, leftAddr);
00322           STRING_TYPE prefix = substr(str, 0, str.length()-len);
00323           //consumeStr.subString(prefix,0, consumeStr.length()-len);
00324 
00325           typename vector<STRING_TYPE>::iterator k=leftStr.begin();
00326           vector<uint64_t>::iterator v=leftAddr.begin();
00327           //delete pStr;
00328           for (; k!=leftStr.end()&& v!=leftAddr.end(); v++,k++)
00329           {
00330             STRING_TYPE tmp = prefix;
00331             tmp += (*k);
00332           
00333             string ss(tmp.c_str(), tmp.size());
00334             //tmp.convertString(ss, UString::UTF_8);
00335             //ss += '\0';
00336             //cout<<ss.size()<<"hash table\n";
00337             hashTable_.insert(ss, *v);
00338           }
00339           
00340             //cout<<"splitted...\n";
00341         }
00342 
00343         //n->display(cout);
00344         
00345         pBucketCache_->unlockNode(memAddr);
00346         pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00347         return true;
00348       }
00349 
00350       //cout<<"**********\n";
00351       n_1 = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00352       
00353       if (!n_1.isNull())
00354       {
00355         n->setMemAddr(idx, memAddr);
00356       }
00357       pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00358 
00359       n = n_1;
00360       
00361       *pStr = substr(*pStr ,1);
00362     }
00363 
00364     
00365     string ss(str.c_str(), str.size());
00366     //ss += '\0';
00367     //delete pStr;
00368     //str.convertString(ss, UString::UTF_8);
00369     //cout<<ss.size()<<"hash table\n";
00370     return hashTable_.insert(ss,contentAddr);
00371   }
00372 
00376   void splitBucket(BucketPtr& b,  AlphabetNodePtr& n, uint64_t diskAddr,
00377                    uint32_t idx, vector<STRING_TYPE>& leftStr, vector<uint64_t>& leftAddr)
00378   {
00379     charT up = b->getUpBound();
00380     charT low = b->getLowBound();
00381     //cout<<up<<" "<<low<<"  "<<b->getStrGroupAmount()<<" 8888888888\n";
00382     
00383     if (b->getStrGroupAmount()==1 && up!=low)
00384     {
00385       //if only have one string group
00386       charT splitPoint = b->getGroupChar(0);
00387       //cout<<splitPoint<<"  00000000000\n";
00388       if (up!=splitPoint)
00389       {
00390         charT beforeSplitPoint = ALPHABET[n->getIndexOf(splitPoint)-1];
00391         BucketPtr b1 =  pBucketCache_->newNode();
00392         
00393         b1->setUpBound(up);
00394         b1->setLowBound(beforeSplitPoint);
00395         n->setDiskAddr(up, beforeSplitPoint, b1->add2disk());
00396         n->setMemAddr(up, beforeSplitPoint, b1.getIndex());
00397       }
00398       
00399       if (splitPoint != low)
00400       {
00401         charT afterSplitPoint = ALPHABET[n->getIndexOf(splitPoint)+1];
00402         BucketPtr b2  = pBucketCache_->newNode();
00403 
00404         b2->setUpBound(afterSplitPoint);
00405         b2->setLowBound(low);
00406         n->setDiskAddr(afterSplitPoint, low, b2->add2disk());
00407         n->setMemAddr(afterSplitPoint, low, b2.getIndex());
00408       }
00409       b->setUpBound(splitPoint);
00410       b->setLowBound(splitPoint);
00411       up = low = splitPoint;
00412     }
00413     
00414     BucketPtr bu = pBucketCache_->newNode();
00415     //cout<<"splitting!\n";
00416     charT splitPoint = b->split(bu.pN_, leftStr, leftAddr);
00417     //cout<<"splitting point: "<<splitPoint<<endl;
00418     uint64_t newBktAddr =  bu->add2disk();
00419     
00420     if (up == low)
00421     {
00422       //cout<<pNodeCache_->getCount();
00423       //cout<<"pBucket_->isPure() \n";
00424       
00425       AlphabetNodePtr newNode = pNodeCache_->newNode();
00426       newNode->setDiskAddr(ALPHABET[0], splitPoint, diskAddr);
00427       newNode->setDiskAddr(bu->getUpBound(), ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1], newBktAddr);
00428       
00429       newNode->setMemAddr(ALPHABET[0], splitPoint, b.getIndex());
00430       newNode->setMemAddr(bu->getUpBound(), ALPHABET[ALPHABET_SIZE-1], bu.getIndex());
00431       
00432       n->setDiskAddr(idx, newNode->add2disk());
00433       n->setMemAddr(idx, newNode.getIndex());
00434     }
00435     else
00436     {
00437       //cout<<"pBucket_ is not Pure\n";
00438       n->setDiskAddr(up, splitPoint, diskAddr);
00439       n->setMemAddr(up, splitPoint, b.getIndex());
00440       n->setDiskAddr(bu->getUpBound(), low, newBktAddr);
00441       n->setMemAddr(bu->getUpBound(), low, bu.getIndex());
00442     }
00443 
00444   }

00449   bool del(const STRING_TYPE& str)
00450   {
00451     return update(str, (uint64_t)-1);
00452   }
00453 
00457   bool update(const STRING_TYPE& str, uint64_t contentAddr)
00458   {
00459     if (pNodeCache_==NULL)
00460     {
00461       return false;
00462     }
00463 
00464     uint32_t idx = 0;
00465     uint64_t addr = 1;
00466     AlphabetNodePtr n_1;
00467     uint32_t idx_1 = 0;
00468     for (size_t i=0; i<str.length()-1; i++)
00469     {
00470       if (addr == (uint64_t)-1)
00471       {
00472         //throw exception
00473         return false;
00474       }
00475       
00476       if (addr%2==0)
00477       {
00478         //load bucket
00479         BucketPtr b = pBucketCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(idx, addr);
00480 
00481         //UString tmp;
00482         //str.subString(tmp, i-1);
00483         
00484         b->updateContent(substr(str, i-1),contentAddr);
00485         return b->update2disk();
00486       }
00487       
00488       AlphabetNodePtr n = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(idx, addr);
00489       
00490       if (n_1!=NULL)
00491       {
00492         n_1->setMemAddr(idx_1, idx);
00493       }
00494       idx_1 = idx;
00495       n_1 = n;
00496       
00497       uint32_t ch = n->getIndexOf(str[i]);
00498       idx = n->getMemAddr(ch);
00499       addr = n->getDiskAddr(ch);
00500     }
00501 
00502     return hashTable_.update(str, contentAddr);
00503   }

00505   bool findRegExp(const STRING_TYPE& regexp,  vector<uint32_t>& ret)
00506   {
00507     vector<item_pair<STRING_TYPE> > v;
00508     findRegExp(regexp, v);
00509 
00510     for (typename vector<item_pair<STRING_TYPE> >::iterator i=v.begin(); i!=v.end();i++)
00511       ret.push_back((uint32_t)i->addr_);
00512 
00513     return ret.size()!=0;
00514   }
00515   
00516   bool findRegExp(const STRING_TYPE& regexp,  vector<item_pair<STRING_TYPE> >& ret)
00517   {
00518     STRING_TYPE sofar;
00519     findRegExp_(0,1, regexp, sofar, ret);
00520     return ret.size()!=0;
00521   }

00523     
00527   uint64_t find(const STRING_TYPE& str)
00528   {
00529     
00530     if (pNodeCache_==NULL)
00531     {
00532       return false;
00533     }
00534 
00535     
00536     uint64_t addr = 1;
00537     uint32_t rootIdx = 0;
00538     
00539     AlphabetNodePtr n = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(rootIdx, addr);//root node address is 1 in disk and 0 in cache
00540     for (size_t i=0; i<str.length()-1; i++)
00541     {
00542       //cout<<str[i]<<"====>\n";
00543       
00544       if (n.isNull())
00545       {
00546         //throw exception
00547         cout<<"Eception 1\n";
00548         return -1;
00549       }
00550 
00551       uint32_t idx = n->getIndexOf(str[i]);
00552       pNodeCache_->lockNode(n.getIndex());
00553       uint64_t diskAddr = n->getDiskAddr(idx);
00554       uint32_t memAddr = n->getMemAddr(idx);
00555 
00556       if (diskAddr == (uint64_t)-1)
00557       {
00558         //throw exception
00559         cout<<"Eception 2\n";
00560         return (uint64_t)-1;
00561       }
00562 
00563       
00564       if (diskAddr%2==0)
00565       {
00566         //load bucket
00567         BucketPtr b = pBucketCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00568         //b->display(cout);
00569         //cout<<str.substr(i)<<"++++++>";
00570 
00571         //UString tmp;
00572         //str.subString(tmp, i);
00573         n->setMemAddr(idx, memAddr);
00574         pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00575         return b->getContentBy(substr(str, i));
00576       }
00577       
00578       AlphabetNodePtr n1 = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00579       n->setMemAddr(idx, memAddr);
00580       pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00581       n = n1;
00582     }
00583 
00584     string ss(str.c_str(), str.size());
00585     //cout<<"find from hashtable\n";
00586     
00587     //str.convertString(ss, UString::UTF_8);
00588     uint64_t* t = hashTable_.find(ss);
00589     if (t ==NULL)
00590       return -1;
00591     
00592     return *t;
00593   }

00603   void display(ostream& os, const STRING_TYPE& str)
00604   {
00605     uint32_t root = 0;
00606     AlphabetNodePtr n = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(root, 1);
00607     //n->display(os);
00608     
00609     for (size_t i=0; i<str.length()-1; i++)
00610     {
00611       os<<endl<<"=========>>>> "<<str[i]<<endl;
00612       uint64_t diskAddr = n->getDiskAddr(n->getIndexOf(str[i]));
00613       uint32_t memAddr = n->getMemAddr(n->getIndexOf(str[i]));
00614 
00615       if (diskAddr == (uint64_t)-1)
00616       {
00617         os<<"The chain is broken!\n!";
00618         return;
00619       }
00620 
00621       if (diskAddr%2==0)
00622       {
00623         BucketPtr b = pBucketCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00624         b->display(cout);
00625         return;
00626       }
00627       
00628       n = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00629     }
00630 
00631     os<<"\nThen, search hash table!";
00632     if(hashTable_.find(str)!= (uint64_t)-1)
00633       os<<"Found!"<<endl;
00634     else
00635       os<<"Not Found!\n";
00636     
00637   }

00650 protected:
00651     
00658   void findRegExp_(uint32_t idx, uint64_t addr, const STRING_TYPE& regexp, const STRING_TYPE& sofar,  vector<item_pair<STRING_TYPE> >& ret)
00659   {
00660      
00661     if (pNodeCache_==NULL)
00662     {
00663       return ;
00664     }
00665 
00666     if (regexp.empty())
00667     {
00668       string ss(sofar.c_str(), sofar.size());
00669       uint64_t ad = *(hashTable_.find(ss));
00670       ret.push_back(item_pair<STRING_TYPE>(sofar, ad));
00671       //ret.push_back(ad);
00672       return;
00673     }
00674     
00675     
00676     AlphabetNodePtr n = pNodeCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(idx, addr);//root node address is 1 in disk and 0 in cache
00677     pNodeCache_->lockNode(n.getIndex());
00678           
00679     if (n.isNull())
00680     {
00681       //throw exception
00682       cout<<"Eception 1\n";
00683       return ;
00684     }
00685       
00686     STRING_TYPE sub = substr(regexp , 1);
00687     //regexp.subString(sub, 1);
00688     uint64_t last_addr = -1;
00689     uint32_t last_mem = -1;
00690     
00691     switch (regexp[0])
00692     {
00693     case '*':
00694       for (uint32_t i=0; i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)
00695       {
00696         STRING_TYPE sf = sofar;
00697         sf += ALPHABET[i];
00698         uint64_t diskAddr = n->getDiskAddr(i);
00699         
00700         if (diskAddr == last_addr)
00701         {
00702           n->setMemAddr(i, last_mem);
00703           continue;
00704         }
00705         
00706         last_addr = diskAddr;
00707         
00708         uint32_t memAddr = n->getMemAddr(i);
00709         if (diskAddr == (uint64_t)-1)
00710           continue;
00711 
00712         if (diskAddr%2==0)
00713         {
00714           //load bucket
00715           BucketPtr b = pBucketCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00716           b->findRegExp(regexp, sofar, ret);
00717           //regexp.displayStringValue(ENCODE_TYPE, cout);
00718 
00719           //cout<<endl;
00720           
00721           n->setMemAddr(i, memAddr);
00722           last_mem = memAddr;
00723 
00724           continue;
00725         }
00726           
00727         findRegExp_(memAddr, diskAddr, regexp, sf, ret);
00728 
00729       }
00730         
00731       findRegExp_(idx, addr, sub, sofar, ret);
00732       pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00733       break;
00734 
00735     case '?':
00736       
00737       last_addr =  -1;
00738       for (uint32_t i=0; i<ALPHABET_SIZE; i++)
00739       {
00740         STRING_TYPE sf = sofar;
00741         sf += ALPHABET[i];
00742         uint64_t diskAddr = n->getDiskAddr(i);
00743         uint32_t memAddr = n->getMemAddr(i);
00744         
00745         if (diskAddr == last_addr)
00746         {
00747           n->setMemAddr(i, last_mem);
00748           continue;
00749         }
00750         
00751         last_addr = diskAddr;
00752         
00753         if (diskAddr == (uint64_t)-1)
00754           continue;
00755 
00756         if (diskAddr%2==0)
00757         {
00758           //load bucket
00759           BucketPtr b = pBucketCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00760         
00761           b->findRegExp(regexp, sf, ret);
00762           n->setMemAddr(i, memAddr);
00763           last_mem = memAddr;
00764           continue;
00765         }
00766           
00767         findRegExp_(memAddr, diskAddr, sub, sf, ret);
00768       }
00769       findRegExp_(idx, addr, sub, sofar, ret);
00770       pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00771 
00772       break;
00773 
00774     default:
00775           
00776       idx = n->getIndexOf(regexp[0]);
00777       uint64_t diskAddr = n->getDiskAddr(idx);
00778       uint32_t memAddr = n->getMemAddr(idx);
00779       STRING_TYPE sf = sofar;
00780       sf += regexp[0];
00781       
00782       if (diskAddr == (uint64_t)-1)
00783       {
00784         //throw exception
00785         cout<<"Eception 2\n";
00786         return ;
00787       }
00788 
00789       
00790       if (diskAddr%2==0)
00791       {
00792         //load bucket
00793         BucketPtr b = pBucketCache_->getNodeByMemAddr(memAddr, diskAddr);
00794         n->setMemAddr(idx, memAddr);
00795         pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00796         //sub.displayStringValue(ENCODE_TYPE, cout);
00797         //b->display(cout);
00798         return b->findRegExp(regexp, sf, ret);
00799       }
00800       
00801       findRegExp_(memAddr, diskAddr, sub, sf, ret);
00802       pNodeCache_->unlockNode(n.getIndex());
00803       break;
00804       
00805     }    
00806   }
00807 
00808 // friend ostream& operator << ( ostream& os, const SelfType& node)
00809 //   {
00810 //   }
00811   
00812 protected:
00813   FILE* nodf_;
00814   FILE* bukf_;
00815   string hashf_;
00816   BucketCacheType* pBucketCache_;
00817   NodeCacheType* pNodeCache_;
00818   HashMap hashTable_;
00819   //  string valuePoolFileName_;
00820   //vector<ValueType> valuePool_;
00821 }
00822   ;
